de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.io.xml

Class PositionalXMLHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.io.xml.PositionalXMLHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler

    public class PositionalXMLHandler
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
    This is an extension of a default xml reader, which saves the line numbers via user data. Original code by: http://eyalsch.wordpress.com/2010/11/30/xml-dom-2/
    Author:
    Jens Meinicke, Sebastian Krieter
